name: Temple Seeker VR
description:
Welcome Adventurer! It's the start of your grand adventure. Or at least... it would be, if you wouldn't get caught in a storm while sailing. 

You woke up on an unknown island, without any way to get off. So then, let's try to find a way to do so! Go forth, explore this mysterious island!

[Currently the game is only available for Oculus Quest but PC version will come soon]
